name: 杰姆·沃尔福特 Jaimz Woolvett
intro: Jaimz Woolvett is a Canadian actor. He was born on April 14, 1967 in Hamilton, Ontario in Canada. Woolvett's highest-profile role was The Schofield Kid, a near-sighted, aspiring gun-fighter in Clint Eastwood's Academy Award-winning Western Unforgiven (1992).[1] He has a younger brother, Gordon Michael Woolvett.
birthplace: 加拿大,安大略省,汉密尔顿市
